OOC: LOL!!  Now that I think of it, I don't think he actually
giggled.......I just was rushing, didn;t stop to think.  Ya, he gave a
SLIGHT grin or chukcle or something.  Nothing to show too much.
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, June 11, 2001 8:02 PM
Subject: Re: Slaughter's/Skulletron's Ability


> He didn't giggle! Evil commanders don't giggle :-)
>
> I think he grinned. I forget though. Maybe he chuckled. But no giggle!
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> > Okay, I'll spill the beans on Slaughter's abilty.  Okay, here goes.
Okay, I got it.  Okay, get ready.  Okay, I say okay a lot.  Okay?  Okay!
Okay, here goes.  Okay, I said thay already, so I'll just say it all now.
Damn, I'm serious, I cant stop saying okay!  DAMN!  *slaps self silly for 45
minutes straight!*  Whew, oka--THERE I GO AGAIN!   *holds breath for 20
minutes.....nearly dies*  No more okays!  Okay?  Doh!
> >
> >   See, Skulletron had a special mental ability, he had the ability to
connect his mind with others' minds, and see what they are thinking, without
them knowing.  They wouldn't know that he connected with their minds unless
he told them, or they figured out some other way like that.  And, here's the
part that his ability is all about, or that he has mostly used it for.  Some
of his victims have been Zardus(by request), and two other characters named
Ga-I forget, and BrightBlade.  And also, Skulletron used it,(sorry I did
that without notice guys, who remember that!) to sort of gain access to
everything, codes, cameras, on the CF.  And now, I'm gonna use it again, on
Motormaster!  Muahaha!  Don't worry, it's not THAT devastating...Unless I
made Skulle-er-Slaughter, make Motormaster commit suicide(or convince him.)
See, he can display images and sounds to try and change one's emotions and
feelings about something or somebody.  He made two people fall in love by
displaying images of hearts around one person, and stuff.  And, when Zardus
asked him to, Skulletron eventually made Zardus give off a little giggle, by
displaying (corny) humorous things.  Now, in my next post, tell what
Motormaster feels.....
>
>
